snippet.title: THE WIND Pixel Horror Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Bug me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/airdorf

PLAY THE GAME HERE:
https://airdorf.itch.io/thewind

THE WIND is a retro-inspired pixel horror game based on The Wind (2018) directed by Emma Tammi.

The Wind tells the story of Lizzy, a tough and resourceful plainswoman, and her struggle against supernatural forces around her isolated home.

The Wind (2018) is released by IFC Films and will be released in theaters and video on demand on April 5!

PLAY MY OTHER GAMES:
FAITH https://airdorf.itch.io/faith
FAITH: Chapter II https://airdorf.itch.io/faith2
